"A.P.238/4/8": "Oya, Who's there? Oh, it's just you. Alright, I won't shoot you then."
"If I start before the festivities, I'll get yelled at."
"Speaking of which the ARKS Battle Fiesta will be starting soon."
"But there's just one annoying rule; you have to team up with someone."
"Lisa wanted to blow everyone's brains out by herself."
"Well, I'll just have to make due with the rules at hand."
"Have you decided who you want to pair with? Lisa is open, you can invite Lisa."
"That is, if Lisa isn't that scary, Fwufufu fufu."
"Alright then see you later. Let's run into each other again."
